definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: At the beginning of 20th century, the issue that the theologians were concerned about primarily was eschatology.
sentences.chinese: 20世紀開始時，神學家們主要關心的問題是末世論。

sentences.english: Jesus has often been referred to by classic theologians as "the avatar of God."
sentences.chinese: 耶穌經常被傳統神學家視爲“上帝的化身。”

sentences.english: This peace of God is not a mere abstraction advocated by preachers and theologians.
sentences.chinese: 神的平安並非由傳道人和神學家所傳揚的抽象概念。

sentences.english: One of the nine choirs of angels as listed by the sixth-century theologian Dionysius the Areopagite.
sentences.chinese: 六世紀的神學家狄奧尼修斯列舉的九個天使級別之一。

sentences.english: Theologists may take the argument one step further.
sentences.chinese: 一些神學家也許對此有更進一步的爭議。

sentences.english: Ding Guangxun, a theologian, is the main speaker of Christians in China.
sentences.chinese: 丁光訓是當代中國基督教的主要發言人和神學家。

sentences.english: Leonardo is one of the renovators of the Theology of Freedom.
sentences.chinese: 李奧納多波夫是一位革新派自由神學家。

sentences.english: He was one of the great scholastic theologians of his era and was very concerned with accurate theology.
sentences.chinese: 他是當代偉大的經院神學家，非常注重神學的準確性。

sentences.english: Greek Christian theologian and founder of Arianism , a doctrine that led to his condemnation as a heretic.
sentences.chinese: 阿里烏斯希臘基督教神學家和阿里烏斯派創始人。
Byassee這位神學家也同意此種觀點。
神學家們今天正在轉折口上。

sentences.english: We’re going to give awards for Best Supporting Theologian in a Musical Role.
sentences.chinese: 我們將爲最佳音樂配角神學家頒獎。

sentences.english: Paul's not necessarily the first Christian theologian.
sentences.chinese: 保羅不一定是第一個基督教神學家。

definition: Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Jobs (name)/see also 史提夫·賈伯斯|史提夫·贾伯斯[Shi3 ti2 fu1 · Jia3 bo2 si1], Steve Jobs
